content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). The boiler is used to convert water into steam using coal, while the steam engine converts steam into electricity.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which is used to smelt iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) which extracts iron ore from the ground.
- A belt group (position not specified) that connects the burner mining drill to the stone furnace.

### Wooden chests
Multiple wooden chests are located at the following positions:
- Position (46.5, -83.5)
- Position (48.5, -83.5)
- Position (5.5, -79.5)
- Position (10.5, -79.5)
- Position (-4.5, -63.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure that the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when connecting Boiler to Steam Engine
- Ensure you have pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
